name: Planet Chaos (Blink Studio)
description:
Made for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2 in around 4 days

DO NOT PLAY THE WEB VERSION!

Destroy and survive the Chaos Planet

Made by a team of 2 developers. Enjoy the game :)

Sound effects: https://freesound.org/

Music: https://www.storyblocks.com/

SkyBox: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/skybox-series-fr...

Planet material: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/floors/yughues-free-...

Model: https://www.turbosquid.com/
